K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-1: a'arya ma h'a ma ni bi pu la bi m'a na su pra tishthi ta gu hya na pa ra ma ra ha syad kalpa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-2: r'a dza n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-4: 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-11: gcer bu pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-12: mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang btul nas pham par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-13: 'khor ba'i skyon 'khor ba'i chu bo'i pha rol tu gshegs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-14: gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g-yog bdud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling bkang ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sa bzhir rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:437b-15: sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra yang ma thos shing mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su bab par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-0: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de yang @438a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-2: rin po che sna bdun gyi padma 'dab ma stong pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-4: snying po ni dzambu chu bo'i gser /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-5: ze ba ni rdo'i snying po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-6: srid ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar thug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-7: 'od dang ldan pa zhig byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-8: padma de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad du snang bar byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-9: de nas padma de las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyis bskul ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-10: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-11: aom ma ni badzra hr'i da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-12: badzra m'a ra see n+ya bi dra ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-15: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-16: sarba m'a ra ba ba na ni h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-17: sam dha ra sam dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-18: buddha mee tri sarba ta th'a ga ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-19: badzra kalpa aa dhishthi te sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-20: padma de las yang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag ste; des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgras bkang nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-21: sh'akya thub pa srid pa'i dgon pa las ni rgal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-23: nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni spangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-24: ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs ni dral /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-25: chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni sbar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-26: gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus sa gzhi rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-27: bdud ni bcom pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438a-29: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spu zing zhes byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-0: lus 'dar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom @438b ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-2: ci'i slad du rigs sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la dzambu'i gling du byang ba lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-4: rigs sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar ma thos lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-7: nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-8: gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-9: de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-10: mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa 'di yang me tog sna tshogs su gyur te 'bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-11: gzungs 'di'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags bye ba btul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-12: 'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus su padma 'di byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-14: gzungs 'di med par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-15: bdud bye ba pham par ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-16: nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems par ma yin te; chos kyi sgron ma spar bar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-18: ngas dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma spyad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-19: ji srid gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-20: mngon par brtson pas brtson 'grus ma byas kyi bar du ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob par ma nus kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-21: phyis ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:438b-23: gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-2: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-4: 'di'i ming gzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan bzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-5: brjod cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang; bsnyen bkur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-6: zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-9: bdug pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-10: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-13: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na yon tan gyi khyad par ci 'dra ba dag gda' ba bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag las gzhan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyi tshogs bsags par mi bgyi lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439a-19: sems can de dag ni snyoms las can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-7: rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-8: des ni gzung 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-11: blo zhan pa rnams kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-13: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzugs 'di la dad pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-17: nga ni 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i ra pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-28: skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:439b-29: gser 'bar ba'i mgo rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-2: bshes gnyen thams cad dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-3: rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal po nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-6: blon po bye ba phrag brgya bcus yongs su bskor cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-7: btsun mo dam pa gsal byed ma zhes bya ba bud med nyi khri'i 'khor can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus la 'gran pa zhig yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams de na yang me tog gi shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-11: dri'i shing gang yin pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-12: chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-13: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-14: thang las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi rang bzhin yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-15: mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri thub ste thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-18: dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-19: rgyal po de yang chos dang mthun pas rgyal srid skyong bar byed kyi chos dang mi mthun pas ni ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440a-20: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam ba can yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams de na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @440b sangs rgyas nor bu bzang chen po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-1: rigs sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gser gyi kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-3: dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-4: 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas bskor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-5: 'od rin po che sna bdun ltar shin tu gsal ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi lus 'od 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-8: rin po che sna bdun gyi padma'i gdan la 'khod pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-9: thams cad kyang spobs pa mi zad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-10: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-11: rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-13: nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sems shing gzungs de nyid kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur to; ;de bzhin gshegs pa de yang gzungs 'di sems can thams cad la rab tu ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-14: sems can de rnams kyang gzungs 'di'i mthus bde ba nyams su myong ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-15: sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:440b-18: lha ma yin gyi ris rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-1: gi sgo thams cad kyang bcad par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-2: mtho ris kyi sgo rnams phye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-3: bde 'gro'i sgo thams cad phye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-7: 'o ma gcig tu gyur pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-9: nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-11: bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-13: gang dag gzungs 'di nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-16: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-21: chung du na ming nyan par byed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-24: mig gis mthong ba tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-27: rtsig pa la bris pa mthong na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441a-28: mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-0: 'phags @441b pa la bskur pa btab pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-11: dman pa 'am; sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i sgrib pa can nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-12: myong bar gyur par ma nges pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-13: bdud kyis zhags pas bcings pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-14: lta ba ngan par lhung ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-15: log 'dren gyis zin pa 'am; rgyu skar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-16: gza'i gnod par byas pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-17: chung du na dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-24: srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgo nga las skyes pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-27: rdzus te skyes pa la sogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-28: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te; 'di la the tshom dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-29: yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g-yos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-31: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-35: ma na d'a ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:441b-36: man d'a ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu bab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-0: lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra @442a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-2: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi lus las 'od zer byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa rtsegs ma bkra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-5: shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-9: them skas bzhi dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-11: grva bzhir nor bu rin po che chen po bzhi nyi ma ltar 'od 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-14: mu tig gi dra ba du ma dpyangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-15: dril bu mang pos mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-16: dar gyi ba dan mang pos kun nas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-17: me tog sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-18: sa 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos te 'gul ldeg la sgra 'byin cing mtho ba dang; dma' bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-19: lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas te lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams cad bskul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-20: rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bskul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-21: rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad kyang bskul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-23: kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-24: bar chad byed pa'i log 'dren thams cad dngangs skrag ste cho nges 'debs shing phyogs bcur byer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig @442b rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar byas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams bskul nas slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-3: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-9: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de gzigs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-11: bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la bab kyi bzhud la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-12: nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de yang rgyas par gson cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-14: gzungs de ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-15: gzungs de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-16: gang la la zhig nyan tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-18: lag pas reg na yang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:442b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis @443a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-1: gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-2: yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-3: ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de la bos nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byung ba ni 'di yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan las bzhengs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-9: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri byung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-10: khri de'i steng du rin po che'i padma bkra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-14: padma'i snying po ni mu tig dmar po can zhig byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-15: de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-16: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu sa chen po 'di che thang du g-yos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-19: steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de 'khor mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-21: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-23: byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-33: mi ma yin pa mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443a-34: rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang po'i 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-0: @443b gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-3: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-4: rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gshegs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-5: de dag thams cad shar phyogs logs su dong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-6: tshad med pa'i gang gla'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das nas nor bu sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin par mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-8: skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams der byon ma thag tu nam mkha' las babs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de'i drung du gshegs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-14: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsungs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-15: rin po che sna bdun gyi padma 'dab ma stong pa zhig byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-17: des phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-18: zab cing zab pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:443b-19: khang pa brtsegs ma de nyid du bzhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-3: khyod kyi chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor lags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-4: khyod kyis bdud dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom lags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-5: khyod kyis chos kyi sgron ma sbar lags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-6: chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng lags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-7: chos kyi rnga brdungs lags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-8: chos kyi dung rab tu bus lags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-10: khyod kyis 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-11: bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-14: khyod kyis deng 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-15: chos kyi gter lan gnyis su bskor mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-30: kun tu rab tu chem chem ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-31: me tog gi char chen po yang rab tu bab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-32: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang snang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-33: sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444a-34: steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang gi lha'i bu rnams kyang lha'i sil snyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-0: yan lag lnga pa dag @444b dkrol bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-1: klu chen po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-2: dri'i phye ma sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-3: tsandan gyi chu sna tshogs kyi char yang 'bebs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-6: lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-7: lha'i mu tig dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-9: nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par snang byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-10: nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-13: dpal gyi snying po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-14: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-19: man d'a ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-20: lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-21: lha'i dngul las byung ba'i me tog gi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-22: lha'i me tog gi phreng ba'i chir yang rab tu 'bebs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-23: nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang aa la la zhes sgra snyan par 'byin cing dbyangs kyang rjes su sgrogs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-24: legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-25: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:444b-26: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-1: chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo chen mo 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu spyod par bgyis pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer sna tshogs bkye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-4: 'od zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bskul cing snang bar mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-6: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang snang bar mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-12: lha ma yin gyi ris rnams su yang bskul zhing snang bar mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-13: slar log nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas slar yang gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-14: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-0: tshad med pa'i gang @445b g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-1: so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma dag sprul nas khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du dzambu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri dag byung ba de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-2: khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod nas rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-8: sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po yang rab tu gda'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:445b-18: mi ma lags pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gda'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-1: 'chang gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po yang lhags nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-3: lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lhags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-5: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang gda' lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-7: nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-8: tshod ni 'di lags so zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-11: song la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la gsol ba thob cig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-12: des khyod la rab tu ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446a-14: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'dug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-0: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di @446b skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-2: nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang pa 'di sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-4: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa; gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-5: song la 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus kyi sa phyogs su rdo rjes sa la bsnun cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-6: de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa mnyan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-8: 'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rjes bsnun te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-9: sa la bsnun ma thag tu de nas gru bzhir gas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-11: g-yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-17: shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-22: them skas bzhi dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-23: 'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-24: rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:446b-25: khang pa brtsegs ma'i dbus der yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-2: mu tig gi dra ba du mas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-3: rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas g-yogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-4: dril bu du ma 'phyang du bcug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-5: dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-6: me tog gi chun po du mas mngon par brgyan pa zhig byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-7: mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so; ;de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtsegs ma de la mchod pa mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de yang khang pa brtsegs ma de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-9: mchod rten la mchod par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-30: mi dang; mi ma yin pa'i 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-32: spro bar gyur nas khang pa brtsegs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-33: mchod rten 'di ci'i phyir byung bar gyur zhes ca co dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-34: ga zha'i sgra mthon por 'byin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447a-36: khang pa brtsegs ma de la bskor ba byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-3: pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-4: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas 'khod de phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-6: de nas khang pa brtsegs ma de las sgra byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-8: bar snang la ci snang ltos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-10: de nas ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis bar snang la bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-11: bltas ma thag tu beed'urya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-12: nor bu rin po che chen po las byung ba'i sprin gyi phung po chen po zhig byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-13: de nas sprin gyi phung po'i steng du nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yi ge gser gyi kha dog tu bris pa mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-14: nam mkha'i dkyil de nyid nas sgra byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-16: nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklag tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-18: sgra byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar sprin gyi phung po la bris pa byung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-19: 'di skad ces kyang dbyangs su sgrogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-20: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:447b-22: mchod rten mchog 'di sgo phye zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:448a-0: mchod rten de'i dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku @448a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:448a-2: de'i mthus cho 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i khyad par chen po 'di snang zhing de kho na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yang snang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:448a-3: nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:448a-6: cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang bcas pa mtha' dag rdzogs shing rgyas par 'khor gyi dbus su legs par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:448a-7: de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:448a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:448a-10: mchod rten rin po che 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:448a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal po me tog rgyal mtshan dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464a-21: aom ma ni sumbha ni be ga ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464a-23: che ge mo la srungs shig h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ku lo ti te sma ra na bi ga te dzv'a la dza la h'um sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464a-26: slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464a-27: thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-0: snying po 'di rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag thams cad yin te dpag tu @464b med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-1: thams cad du yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-2: de nas dgos pa brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-5: sdig pa de ni zad byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-6: sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-8: lung ston 'gyur te the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-9: gang gis snga mar sdig pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-11: rig pa bla med su 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-12: de dag myur du sangs rgyas 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-13: chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-14: byang chub rtogs par sla ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-15: ji ltar gang+g'a'i bye snyed kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-16: bsod nams dpag tu med 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-17: rig sngags rgyas par sgrub pa'i le'u ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-19: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-20: sngon du sa yongs su brtags nas phyi nas las brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-21: dri'i snod gtsang mar blugs pa'i tshon sna lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi ba bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su tsandan gyis byugs te gur gum gyis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-23: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni khru gnyis pa'o; ;phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni grva bzhi pa rva'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:464b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-1: padma'i gdan bkra zhing tshon sna bdun dang ldan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-2: padma'i snying po'i steng du gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa mu khyud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-3: lti ba dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la kun nas kha khyer dang ldan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-6: shar la sogs pa'i sgor ni khru'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-8: tshon sna lnga'i rgya dag gi gos zung gis brgyan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-9: g-yon du lag na rdo rje bsdigs pa'i gzugs can rnga yab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-10: mtshon cha thogs shing bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-11: g-yas su byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa g-yas pa na nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-12: rnga yab thogs nas bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-13: zur bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-15: tshem tshem bgos shing lag na mtshon cha thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-17: ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa drag po'i gzugs can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-18: mtshams bzhir sbos chus gang ba'i gser gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-19: gal te gser gyi snod med na rdza'i bum pa tshad mi chung ba la gser g-yogs nas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465a-20: de lta bu'i snod mi 'dzag par 'o mas gang bar byas nas phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi g-yas logs su lha mo dpal @465b chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-1: g-yon du lha mo chen mo dung can ma bzhugs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-2: sgo'i dbus su lha mo chen mo rdo rje pho nya mo phyag brgyad pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-3: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing bzhugs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po phyogs bzhir dar sngon po 'phyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-6: tshul sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-7: bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-8: mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-10: me tog sna tshogs rnams gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni gser las grub pa'i bum pa gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-12: so sor du ru ka bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi snying por dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi bum pa gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdug spos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-15: nor bu 'dzin pa'i du ru ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-22: dung can ma'i gu gul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-23: pho nya mo'i sha la'i bdug spos te so sor bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-26: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes shing cha mdzes pab kra shis kyi sgo bzhig nas ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-27: shar gyi sgor khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:465b-29: nub tu me tog so zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-1: du 'jigs byed ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo ngo tsha dang bcas pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-2: na chung bdun dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-3: de nas phur bu sum cu so gnyis gdab par byas la kha dog lnga'i skud pas phur bu bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-4: zur bzhi mnyam par kha dog lnga'i ba dan gyis brgyan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-5: me tog sna tshogs dgram pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-7: me tog sna tshogs rnams ma 'khrugs pa mnyam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-8: bcud sna tshogs 'phrog pa'i snod bdun gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-9: rdza'i snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-10: phye ma'i snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-11: pog phor sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-12: mar me brgya rtsa brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-13: phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-14: dri yis gang ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-16: kun du ru sna tshogs sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-17: de nas sgo nas 'jug pa la dri yis gang ba'i bum pa gnyis gzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-18: ji ltar rnyed pa'i gtor ma byin nas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhug pa'i cho ga la spyad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-19: de nas aom ma ni bi pu la pra tishthi ta siddhe aa bhi shinytsa ya mam sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she keerbha ra bha ra sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-20: ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis dbang bskur na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466a-22: mya ngan las 'das pa yang mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-0: gang bsams pa'i don de de bzhin @466b du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos zab mo la bzod pa 'thob cing rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-3: byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-4: de lta bu la sogs pa yon tan gyi khyad par rnams 'thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-5: ji srid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ma rdzogs kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-8: de nas phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-9: snying po chen po bzhi'i phyag rgya la sbyar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi la sbyar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-11: lag na rdo rje'i snying po bzhi'i phyag rgya btus pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi gdan gyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-13: phyag rgya gzhan yang brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-14: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya la sbyar ba'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-15: phyi rol gyi phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-16: thams cad du phyag rgya gzhan rnams ji ltar bde bar brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-17: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sbyar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ma ni dzva la ni a'a be sh'a ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra bha bar gra ma ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:466b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-0: @467a *// aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ya b'i sam bho dha na [?] h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishtha na ma ni ma ni h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra ba ra ma ni ru tsi ru tsi h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i seng+ge'i khri'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta bi pu la sam bha be h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya ma ni badzra h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dza ya aa pa r'a dzi ta badzra h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-11: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dharma dh'a tu mah'a ma ni shi kha re ha ra ha ra h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a badzra ha ya ha ra ha ra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-15: 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes gzung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-16: aom du ru du ru ma ni ma ni mah'a bi du ta ma ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-17: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste 'phags pa nor bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-18: aom lo k'a p'a li te dza ya dza ya h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-19: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-20: aom bi pu la gra pa ti sam bha ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-21: dpal lha mo'i phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467a-22: aom dam shti ni sam h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-0: dung can ma'i bsdigs pa'i phyag @467b rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-1: aom a'a ga ma ya dri ra mu tstsha da t'a h'a sti ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-2: pho nya mo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-3: aom aa nanta aa ka ri bi p'u ra ni ta ka ta ka h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-4: dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-5: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-6: aom sa ra sa ra bi sa ra h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-8: phyag rgya rgyas pa'i le'u ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-10: de nas don kun sgrub pa'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-11: ras kha tshar ma bcad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-14: khru do gru bzhi lham pa la ri mo mkhan smyung ba byas pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-15: snod gsar par tshon spyin med pas bcom ldan 'das rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-16: padma'i steng na chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-17: khang pa brtsegs mas yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-18: g-yas su lag na rdo rje lag pa bcu gnyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-19: ston ka'i 'dam bu mda' rgyu lta bu'i mdog can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-20: lag pa na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa gdong bzhi pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-21: gdong dang po ni zhi ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-23: gsum pa ni mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-24: bzhi pa ni gdong khro gnyer can gyen du blta ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-25: ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-26: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-27: padma'i steng na skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:467b-28: g-yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rdo rje zhes bya ba gdong bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-2: lag pa g-yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-3: lag pa g-yon na padma thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-4: lag pa gcig gis dbugs 'byin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-5: lag pa gnyis ni thal mo sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-6: lag pa gzhan ni mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-11: me tog gi phur ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-18: gdong dang po ni zhi ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-19: gdong g-yas pa ni nag po chen po dang 'dra ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-20: gdong g-yon pa ni mi'i seng+ge'i dbyibs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-21: shing p'a la sha'i kha dog lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-22: gdong gong ma ni bzhin bsgyur ba padma'i gdan la skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-23: de'i 'og tu dung can ma bri ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-24: lag pa brgyad pa pus mo btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-25: lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu dpal lha mo chen mo pus mo btsugs nas nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-26: dpal lha mo chen mo'i rgyab tu pho nya mo bzhin 'dzum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-28: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468a-29: mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-0: dung can ma'i @468b rgyab tu me tog so gos dkar po gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-1: me tog thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la gyen du blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog can gyi padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-3: sdong bu ni bee d'u rya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-4: snying po ni gser las byas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-5: de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi 'khor lo shin tu rnam par phye ba lte ba dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-7: shin tu rnam par bkra ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-8: padma de'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi ya lad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-12: padma de'i drung du rdzing bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-13: rdzing bu de'i 'gram du rig pa 'dzin pa lag pa na pog phor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-14: me tog gi mgo lcogs thogs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-15: lag pa cig shos na ba grang phreng thogs te pus mo btsugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la gyen du lta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-16: khang pa brtsegs ma'i gan du tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-18: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa nam mkha'i dkyil na bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-19: de la sogs pa sku gzugs kyi cho ga rnams bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:468b-20: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas gos dkar po bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-0: zas dkar gsum za bas tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga nya'i bar du sku gzugs kyi mdun @469a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-1: du bzlas brjod 'bum tshang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-2: de nas sku gzugs 'gul zhing bdag nyid 'bar bar mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-3: sgrib pa med pa'i mig thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-4: nor bu rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-5: rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-7: bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-8: dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-11: gti mug la sogs pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-12: ser sna'i dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-13: bsod nams thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-14: bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-18: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-19: lha thams cad kyis yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469a-29: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-0: rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du @469b mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-1: 'jig rten thams cad la dbang bskur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-4: de la sogs pa yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-6: bzlas brjod byas pa tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-7: bklags pa tsam gyis yon tan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-8: phan yon 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur na; cho ga lhag par mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-9: gang zhig klog par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-11: bzlas brjod la mngon par brtson par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-13: phyag rgya'i tshogs sgrub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-14: rig sngags sgrub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-15: ras zung sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kho nar brjod par bya ste; mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-18: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-19: sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par blta bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa gnang bas sems can de ni phyir mi ldog par gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gsal bar lung bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:469b-22: phyin chad ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-0: der padma la rdzus te skye bar @470a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-2: phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bral bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-5: gang du skyes pa de thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-6: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mthar phyin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-7: sku gzugs rgyas pa chen po'i le'u ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-9: don kun sgrub par byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-10: sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-11: sems can kun gyi bde thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-12: zhi ba yi ni las brtsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-13: rig pa 'dzin pas gsang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-14: nges par tshangs par spyod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-15: sems can thams cad yid dga' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-16: de nas sbyin sreg dag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-17: aom sva h'a pa ti bhurbh'u ba h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-20: mar la sbyin sreg byas na rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-22: log 'dren thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-26: mi mdza' ba thams cad rmugs par byas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470a-30: ltas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-1: mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gdon thams cad kyi klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-2: 'byung po thams cad kyis gnod pa byas pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-3: rims nad la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-4: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-6: yungs kar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-8: mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pas 'jigs skrag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-9: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la sogs pa 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-11: mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-16: ri khar sra rtsi log [?] dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-18: mar las sbyin sreg byas na lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-22: na ga ge sar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro; ;ci bsgo ba byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-23: dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:470b-24: phyin chad ser ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-0: kha zas la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na 'bru stong @471a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-2: lan tshva la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad lhags nas rje btsun srog dang mi dbral cig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-3: bka' ci stsal ba de bgyi'o zhes rkang pa la gtugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-5: mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-6: nyi ma la kha bltas te na le sham la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na de la lha thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-10: dpal lha mo'i mdun du til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-11: yungs kar las sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-13: shing aarga'i yam sreg shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-14: mar las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-16: sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad mngon du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-19: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-20: dgra thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-21: 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471a-22: rig sngags 'di'i ma thus bde ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-0: ltas ngan pa thams cad med @471b par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-3: gnod pa thams cad nam yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-4: de la sogs te sbyin sreg gi las rnams kyis mchog tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-6: rab tu sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-8: don 'grub par byed cing lta ba ngan par ltung ba'i sems can thams cad nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-9: sbyin sreg grub pa rgyas pa'i le'u ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-13: 'di ni cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-14: 'di ni yon tan khyad par chen po can yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-15: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-17: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-18: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-19: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-20: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-21: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gdan yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:471b-22: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud thams cad pham par byed cing 'joms par byed pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-1: thams cad kyi gsang ba dam pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-2: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-4: 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-5: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa 'jigs pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-6: 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi dmyal ba thams cad skems pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-7: yi dvags kyi 'jig rten zlog pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-8: dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-9: 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-17: 'khrug pa rnams skyems par byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-19: 'on kyang bsod nams kyi phung po 'byung ba lha'i mig gis blta ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ste; yon tan gyi khyad par de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar zab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472a-21: rab mchog gya nom pa la sogs pa de ltar gong nas gong du rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i khyad par 'phags pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-0: no; ;chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di ni sems can skal ba chung du ba rnams kyi @472b lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-4: gang gis gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba de'i lag tu mchog tu gsang ba 'di 'ong ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gting dpag dka' ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-11: gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgyad stong gi bye ma dang mnyam pa rnams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-12: bskal pa brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad na bza' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-15: bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-21: pho brang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyi ma re re 'bul zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-22: de bzhin du me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-29: ba dan gyis de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:472b-30: gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis byur bur bkang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-0: nyi ma re re sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul ba ni @473a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-1: bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-3: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-5: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di lan gcig dran par gyur na ni de gong du bshang pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par yongs su bsgrags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-6: mkho ba'i yo byad khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la de ltar nyin gcig bzhin mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-7: de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-17: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-18: aa la la zhes ca co dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473a-19: ga zha'i sgra cher bton nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473b-0: sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mtshungs par mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gsang ba dam pa'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag @473b lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473b-1: de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sh'akya thub ba la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su gshegs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gshegs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473b-3: 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i le'u ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473b-5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra pra bha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473b-6: lotstsha ba bande dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473b-7: slad nas rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra pra bha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-011:473b-8: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bende dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa //
